name: R5-AllergyIntolerance-R4-AllergyIntolerance
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 AllergyIntolerance into FHIR R4

element.display: Allergy or Intolerance (generally: Risk of adverse reaction to a substance)

target.display: Allergy or Intolerance (generally: Risk of adverse reaction to a substance)
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance`

element.display: food | medication | environment | biologic

target.display: food | medication | environment | biologic
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.category` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.category` - category has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergy-intolerance-category|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergy-intolerance-category|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: active | inactive | resolved

target.display: active | inactive | resolved
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.clinicalStatus` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.clinicalStatus` - clinicalStatus has compatible required binding for non-code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergyintolerance-clinical|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergyintolerance-clinical|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: Code that identifies the allergy or intolerance

target.display: Code that identifies the allergy or intolerance
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.code` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.code`

element.display: Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.contained`

element.display: low | high | unable-to-assess

target.display: low | high | unable-to-assess
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.criticality` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.criticality` - criticality has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergy-intolerance-criticality|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergy-intolerance-criticality|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: Encounter when the allergy or intolerance was asserted

target.display: Encounter when the allergy or intolerance was asserted
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.encounter` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.encounter`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.display: Logical id of this artifact
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.id`

element.display: External ids for this item

target.display: External ids for this item
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.implicitRules`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.display: Language of the resource content
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`

element.display: Date(/time) of last known occurrence of a reaction

target.display: Date(/time) of last known occurrence of a reaction
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.lastOccurrence` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.lastOccurrence`

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.display: Metadata about the resource
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Additional text not captured in other fields

target.display: Additional text not captured in other fields
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.note` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.note` - note has change due to type change: R5 `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `note`

element.display: When allergy or intolerance was identified

target.display: When allergy or intolerance was identified
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.onset[x]` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.onset[x]`

element.display: Who or what participated in the activities related to the allergy or intolerance and how they were involved
Who or what participated in the activities related to the allergy or intolerance
Additional content defined by implementations
Type of involvement
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Who the allergy or intolerance is for

target.display: Who the sensitivity is for
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.patient` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.patient`

element.display: Adverse Reaction Events linked to exposure to substance

target.display: Adverse Reaction Events linked to exposure to substance
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction`

element.display: Description of the event as a whole

target.display: Description of the event as a whole
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.description` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.description`

element.display: How the subject was exposed to the substance

target.display: How the subject was exposed to the substance
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.exposureRoute` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.exposureRoute`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.id`

element.display: Clinical symptoms/signs associated with the Event

target.display: Clinical symptoms/signs associated with the Event
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.manifestation` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.manifestation` - manifestation has change due to type change: R5 manifestation CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 manifestation

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Text about event not captured in other fields

target.display: Text about event not captured in other fields
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.note` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.note` - note has change due to type change: R5 `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `note`

element.display: Date(/time) when manifestations showed

target.display: Date(/time) when manifestations showed
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.onset` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.onset`

element.display: mild | moderate | severe (of event as a whole)

target.display: mild | moderate | severe (of event as a whole)
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.severity` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.severity` - severity has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/reaction-event-severity|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/reaction-event-severity|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: Specific substance or pharmaceutical product considered to be responsible for event

target.display: Specific substance or pharmaceutical product considered to be responsible for event
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.substance` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.substance`

element.display: Date allergy or intolerance was first recorded

target.display: Date first version of the resource instance was recorded
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.recordedDate` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.recordedDate`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.text`

element.display: allergy | intolerance - Underlying mechanism (if known)

target.display: allergy | intolerance - Underlying mechanism (if known)
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.type` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.type` - type made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergy-intolerance-type|4.0.1; type has change due to type change: R5 type CodeableConcept has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 type

element.display: unconfirmed | presumed | confirmed | refuted | entered-in-error

target.display: unconfirmed | confirmed | refuted | entered-in-error
target.comment: R5 `AllergyIntolerance.verificationStatus` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.verificationStatus` - verificationStatus has compatible required binding for non-code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergyintolerance-verification|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergyintolerance-verification|4.0.1 (Equivalent)
